a, b, c = map(int, input().split()) #map(function, iterable)

print(c - (a - b))

# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if a > b:
    print(c - (a - b))
else:
    print(c + b - a)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b) if a > b else 0)


# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > d:
    print(b + c - d)
else:
    print(0)

print(int(input()) + int(input()) + int(input()))
